# Travel Agency E-commerce Project Setup

## Project: travelli_amo
Next.js 14 travel agency e-commerce with Supabase backend

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Setup Supabase configuration
- [x] Create database schema
- [x] Implement authentication system
- [x] Build public pages
- [x] Implement booking system
- [x] Build admin dashboard
- [x] Install dependencies and test

## Project Guidelines
- Use JavaScript (not TypeScript)
- Use Next.js 14 App Router
- Use Supabase for database and authentication
- Keep code clean and well-commented
- Follow Italian naming for UI elements where appropriate
